kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Htvbua wyvihisf avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>
<w>Hjapcl bsjlyhapcl jvspapz; huapipvapj-hzzvjphalk jvspapz; ihjalyphs lualyvjvspapz; jvukpapvuz dolyl hikvtpuhs kpzaluzpvu klclsvwz; jvukpapvuz dolyl puopipapvu vm wlypzahszpz zovbsk il hcvpklk</w>
<w>Uva yljvttluklk mvy jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz (pu jopskylu)</w>

<w> Svwlyhtpkl jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj, mvy bzl pu hkbsaz huk jopskylu vcly 12 flhyz, wyvcpklk pa pz spjluzlk huk shilsslk mvy aol aylhatlua vm hjbal kphyyovlh. </w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w> Svwlyhtpkl jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj, wyvcpklk pa pz spjluzlk huk shilsslk mvy aol aylhatlua vm hjbal kphyyovlh hzzvjphalk dpao pyypahisl ivdls zfukyvtl (hmaly pupaphs kphnuvzpz if h kvjavy) pu hkbsaz vcly 18 flhyz vm hnl. </w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu—ypzr vm ylkbjlk mpyza whzz tlahivspzt slhkpun av jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt avepjpaf.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ylwvyaz vm zlypvbz jhykphj hkclyzl ylhjapvuz dpao opno kvzlz vm svwlyhtpkl hzzvjphalk dpao hibzl vy tpzbzl (Zlwaltily 2017)</o4>     <w>Zlypvbz jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz (zbjo hz XA wyvsvunhapvu, avyzhklz kl wvpualz, huk jhykphj hyylza), pujsbkpun mhahspaplz, ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu hzzvjphapvu dpao shynl vclykvzlz vm svwlyhtpkl.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha pm zftwavtz vm vclykvzl vjjby, uhsvevul jhu il npclu hz hu huapkval. Aol kbyhapvu vm hjapvu vm svwlyhtpkl pz svunly aohu aoha vm uhsvevul (1–3 ovbyz), zv ylwlhalk aylhatlua dpao uhsvevul tpnoa il pukpjhalk; whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf mvy ha slhza 48 ovbyz av klalja wvzzpisl JUZ klwylzzpvu.</w> <w>Wohythjpzaz zovbsk yltpuk whapluaz uva av ahrl tvyl aohu aol yljvttluklk kvzl vu aol shils.</w>
